1.Yahiya Emerick: In the Name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful

2.Yahiya Emerick: Praise be to God, Lord of all the Worlds

4.Yahiya Emerick: and Master of the Day of Judgement

5.Yahiya Emerick: To You alone do we render service and to You alone do we look for aid

6.Yahiya Emerick: Guide us on the straight path

7.Yahiya Emerick: the path of those whom You have favored, not of those who've earned Your anger, nor of those who've gone astray

3.SurahEnglishNames: The Family of Imran, The House of Imran

1.Yahiya Emerick: Praise be to God, the One Who sent down to His servant a Book in which He allowed no crookedness

2.Yahiya Emerick: (It's a book that's) straightforward (and clear), so He can warn (all people) of a terrible penalty from Him, and so that He can give good news to the believers who do what's morrally right that they're going to have an excellent reward

3.Yahiya Emerick: (a reward) that will stay with them forever

4.Yahiya Emerick: (It's also a message that been revealed) so He can warn those who say, "God has begotten a son.

5.Yahiya Emerick: They have no knowledge (that could justify their claim), nor did their forefathers (have and certain proof), either. It's really an outrageous statement that's coming out of their mouths, for what they're saying is no more that a lie

6.Yahiya Emerick: Perhaps you worry yourself to death as you follow after them, distressed that they're not believing in this narration

7.Yahiya Emerick: Whatever (riches and distractions) that We've placed in the earth are but a dazzling display by which We test them, in order to bring out those whose conduct is best

8.Yahiya Emerick: (In the end), We're going to reduce whatever is upon (the earth) to dry dust

46.SurahEnglishNames: The Wind-curved Sandhills, The Dunes, The Sandhills

49.SurahEnglishNames: The Private Apartments, The Inner Apartments, The Chambers

17.Yahiya Emerick: And thus, We`ve made this Qur`an easy to remember, so will anybody be reminded

56.SurahEnglishNames: The Event, The Inevitable, That Which is Coming

60.SurahEnglishNames: She That is to be Examined, Examining her, She Who is Tested

83.SurahEnglishNames: Defrauding, The Defrauders, The Cheats, Cheating
